. The area compromises the villages Warth, Hochkrummbach, Lechleithen and Schröcken. It is one of the most popular winter sport resorts in the area.

is free and travels every 5 to 30 minutes, depending on the time of the day, between the villages and skilifts. In winter you can often directly ski down to your hotel.

If you stay inside Warth you can easily make your way by foot.

value: content=Great winter sport resort with 15 lifts and about 70 km (46 mi) of slopes.

and enjoy the fine slopes and magnificent views. Warth-Schröcken is one of the most secure resorts in terms of snow. There are about 70 km (46 mi) slopes and many routes for advanced and back country skiers and snowboarders.
on an area of 15,000 m² (161,000 ft²) with rails, quarter pipe and big jumps.

Being a winter sport resort the prices for everyday shopping are a bit higher than usually in Vorarlberg. However there is a SPAR supermarket which is also open on Sunday in Warth and another one in Schröcken. Winter sports equipment can be rented in one of the several sports stores.

value: directions=right at Warth Dorfplatz village square

content=For over 45 years this is the place to be for youngsters and adults alike. It's a nice bar with fair prices. In the early evening the music is still very après like, but gets way better as the night advances. There's also billiard and a table soccer available.
